attributes.action: BAN THE MUSLIM ISLAM4UK MARCH THROUGH WOOTTON BASSET.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is allegedly a planned march by Islam4UK at Wootten Basset. This is the town where dead British soldiers returning from Afghanistan are mourned in a huge street gathering as the cortege passes through the silence in honour of the fallen. This makes for a sacred place to British people. A Muslim march should be banned here. It is not right.

This is not a group to incite racism, facism or any other ideas similar whatsoever.

This is intended to be a group of peacefull people who wish to add large numbers in aid of a common belief. It is hoped that these large numbers will be used as a vote and the total sent to the relevant authority.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
